title: [Ta'Illistim, Glimaer Wey]
description: The cobblestoned wey continues to curve in snake-like fashion, winding its way among the almost gardenlike setting.  A birdbath stands beneath a small grove of nearby trees, the moonlight reflecting a silvery sheen upon the watery surface of the bowl.

The cobblestoned wey continues to curve in snake-like fashion, winding its way among the almost gardenlike setting.  A birdbath stands beneath a small grove of nearby trees, its denizens alternatively splashing and chasing one another away from the water-filled bowl.

The cobblestoned wey continues to curve in a snake-like fashion, winding its way among an almost garden-like setting.  A birdbath stands beneath a small grove of nearby trees, its water-filled bowl a tarnished copper.
